member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostBuilder.ConfigureAppConfiguration(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostBuilderContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder})
member.summary: Sets up the configuration for the remainder of the build process and application. The passed in is the host's configuration built from calls to . This can be called multiple times and the results will be additive. After all calls have been processed, will be updated with the results for future build steps. The resulting configuration will also be available in the DI Container.
member.param: The delegate for configuring the that will be used to construct the for the application.
member.returns: The same instance of the for chaining.

member.returns: The same instance of the for chaining.

member.returns: The same instance of the for chaining.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime
member.summary: Allows consumers to perform cleanup during a graceful shutdown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime})
member.summary: This API supports infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This API may change or be removed in future releases.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.NotifyStarted
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStarted event and blocks until it completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.NotifyStopped
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStopped event and blocks until it completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.StopApplication
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStopping event and blocks until it completes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStarted
member.summary: Gets a cancellation token. Triggered when the application host has fully started and is about to wait for a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopped
member.summary: Gets a cancellation token. Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. All requests should be complete at this point. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping
member.summary: Gets a cancellation token. Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. Request may still be in flight. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ConsoleLifetime
member.summary: Listens for Ctrl+C or SIGTERM and initiates shutdown.
This API supports infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This API may change or be removed in future releases.
This API supports infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This API may change or be removed in future releases.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ConsoleLifetime.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Called from to indicate that the host is stopping and it's time to shut down.
member.param: Used to indicate when stop should no longer be graceful.
member.returns: A .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ConsoleLifetime.WaitForStartAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Called at the start of , which will wait until it's complete before continuing. This can be used to delay startup until signaled by an external event.
member.param: Used to indicate when stop should no longer be graceful.
member.returns: A .
